column21: The fossils are compared to Polypodium, with reference to P. vulgare complex. Our tree rendered a paraphyletic Polypodium by monotypic Pleurosoriopsis. Two options: assign the fossil to stem Polypodium ss (excluding Pleurosoriopsis and P. pellucidum) or to crown Polypodium sl (including Pleurosoriopsis and P. pellucidum). As the fossil clearly aligns with Polypodium, we here chose to calibrate crown Polypodium sl.
